com.cloudera.oryx.als.common

Class TopN

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.TopN

  • public final class TopN
extends Object
    Utility methods for finding the top N things from a stream.
    Author:
    Sean Owen, Mahout

      • selectTopNIntoQueue

        public static void selectTopNIntoQueue(Queue<NumericIDValue> topN,
                       Iterator<NumericIDValue> values,
                       int n)
        Computes top N values for a stream and puts them into a Queue.
        Parameters:
        topN - Queue to add to
        values - stream of values from which to choose
        n - how many top values to choose

      • selectTopNIntoQueueMultithreaded

        public static void selectTopNIntoQueueMultithreaded(Queue<NumericIDValue> topN,
                                    float[] queueLeastValue,
                                    Iterator<NumericIDValue> values,
                                    int n)
        Computes top N values for a stream and puts them into a Queue. Used in the context of multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        topN - Queue to add to
        queueLeastValue - in/out parameter caching the queue's least value
        values - stream of values from which to choose
        n - how many top values to choose

      • selectTopNFromQueue

        public static List<NumericIDValue> selectTopNFromQueue(Queue<NumericIDValue> topN,
                                       int n)
        Parameters:
        topN - Queue of items from which to take top n
        n - how many top values to choose
        Returns:
        order list of top results

      • selectTopN

        public static List<NumericIDValue> selectTopN(Iterator<NumericIDValue> values,
                              int n)
        Parameters:
        values - stream of values from which to choose
        n - how many top values to choose
        Returns:
        the top N values (at most), ordered by value descending.
